title: Look alive!
brief_description: Designed to motivate an awareness of electrical safety amongst tradespeople, the film is fast-paced and amusing rather than merely instructional. It covers the use of protective clothing, safety equipment, power tools and safety procedures.
description: Designed to motivate an awareness of electrical safety amongst tradespeople, the film is fast-paced and amusing rather than merely instructional. It covers the use of protective clothing, safety equipment, power tools and safety procedures.
